mapper.insert: insert into db_ebaymessagebind (SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', 'KEY', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SORT, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_ebaymessagebind set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'KEY' = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', 'KEY', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SORT, DESCR from db_ebaymessagebind where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', 'KEY', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SORT, DESCR from db_ebaymessagebind
